name: Dog Game - The Dogs Collector!
description:
From cute puppies to adorable mini-games, this game has it all! You'll be caring for your doggy pals any chance you get!

Dog Game is simple yet highly-addictive! To play, all you need to do is collect different kinds of cute and unique dogs and build a home for them. You can craft decorations and create lovely rooms in your Dog Tower and unlock cute new dogs every single day.

There are over 900 you can collect!

DOG GAME HIGHLIGHTS
- Collect over 900 puppies!
- Watch your animals come to life with cute animations.
- Craft furniture and decorate your dream Dog Tower.
- Play special events and earn exclusive dogs and prizes.
- Enter contests to design the most adorable rooms.
- Play fun and addictive mini-games to earn coins.
- Join a club and play with your friends (and make new ones).
- Compete in the leaderboard for exclusive rewards.
- Participate in daily missions and contests!
- Discover new content every week!

Your future puppies are waiting for you now! Put your paws to work, play with friends and clubs, and download Dog Game for free now!
